about_the_game:
Face monsters from your subconscious by night and the struggles of young adulthood by day in this turn-based tactical mental-health cozy horror RPG to get... A Good Night's Rest.

CONQUER YOUR FEARS

  • Start university far from home? Tough. Add in nightmares disrupting your sleep? Even tougher.

  • Push back subconscious monsters by making friends, honing strategies, and upgrading abilities.

  • Lasting resilience comes from facing your deepest anxieties, whether in climactic boss battles or daytime revelations.

    MANAGE YOUR MENTAL HEALTH

  • School's demanding, time's scarce.

  • Skipping class to catch some Zs might make you feel Rested, but it could spike your Anxiety.

  • Every daytime choice impacts your nighttime battles, so choose wisely.

    FRIENDSHIP TAKES WORK

  • Meet a diverse cast, each with their own stories and backgrounds.

  • Choose your interactions carefully—flirt, fight, or fall in love.

  • Your decisions shape not only your world but also the dreamscape and your companions’ stories.

    SURVIVE THE NIGHT

  • You can't just defeat your nightmares.

  • Dying wakes you up, and running won't help.

  • Use newfound friendships and mental abilities to hold off the terrors until dawn.

    A VIVID HAND-DRAWN ADVENTURE

  • Traditional artistry and animation bring the cozy college setting to life by day.

  • Rich environmental storytelling reveals fantastical landscapes and terrifying creatures by night.

    ORIGINAL MUSIC BY LEFT AT LONDON

  • Indie Pop singer-songwriter Left at London’s music has brought her worldwide acclaim and has previously been featured in games including Fortnite.

  • Left at London brings her unique style to this game with an original soundtrack across multiple genres.

  • Let her electrifying melodies set the tone for your journey.
